parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the airbag system can lead to the non-deployment of airbags in the event of an accident, increasing the risk of injury or fatality to occupants.
symptoms: defective wiring connector at the sensor units

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Discontinued Airbag Parts and Unaffordable Repairs
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The discontinuation of airbag parts and the high cost of repairs can leave vehicles with malfunctioning airbag systems, putting occupants at risk of injury or fatality in the event of an accident.
symptoms: dealership unable to repair due to discontinued parts

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the DSG transmission can cause the vehicle to suddenly shift out of gear, lose propulsion, or stall, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle slips out of gear without warning
the engine dash light and anti-sway lights come on
the vehicle redlines for a few seconds
the vehicle shifts into neutral or first gear automatically
the vehicle jerks or lurches forward

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the turbocharger can cause the vehicle to stall, lose power, and emit white smoke from the exhaust pipe, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: white smoke emerging from the exhaust pipe

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The engine failure and excessive oil consumption can cause the vehicle to stall, lose power, and lead to engine damage, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.
The malfunction of the convertible top can cause water leaks, difficulty closing or opening the top, and other issues, which can lead to water damage, safety risks, and inconvenience.
symptoms: Difficulty closing or opening the convertible top

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission issues can cause the vehicle to hesitate, lose power, and accelerate erratically, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
